QuestData.Title: The Sentinel's Game
QuestData.Description: As you place the statue in its place, several other stone statues appear in the room. One more ruby-colored statue also appears, in a small enclosure on the far end of the room. You hear a voice:$b$b "The Sentinel watches.$b The Sentinel protects.$b The Sentinel's vision never falters."$b$bThat red statue on the other side of the room looks important. Perhaps you should try to connect the two red statues?
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete the Sentinel's Game by connecting the two red statues.
QuestData.RewardText: <The red statue falls over, and you place it back in your bags. You hear a rumbling noise in the tomb's central chamber.>
